page.title: 01HOLTON-LE-CLAY AND AREA
page.content: Our area consists of mostly cultivated farm land. {Farms:}there are two farms in Humberston,three in Tetney and one in New Waltham.In Holton-le-Clay there are three. {Schools:}there are three schools in our area.One of these is now a youth club. The other two are{Primary}and {Junior. {Shops:}we have various types of shops in our area such as supermarkets, butchers,hairdressers,hardware and newsagents.We also have a woolshop and two fish shops. {Pubs:}there are three pubs, one in New Waltham and the other two in Holton-le-Clay. {
